extension.news:
v1.0.11 (2024-04-21) - Add support for IP based login - Show an error if a library only offers login methods not supported by this addon
v1.0.10 (2024-02-27) - Add support for Austrian and Swiss libraries On login users now first have to select their country
v1.0.9 (2024-02-05) - Automatically refresh an expired access_token When updating from an earlier version, the autorefresh only works after the next manual login
v1.0.8 (2024-01-17) - Support libraries with external authentication (like VÖBB Berlin or Nuremberg)
extension.summary: This video add-on provides access to shows and movies of Filmfriend.de.
extension.description: This video add-on provides access to shows and movies of Filmfriend.de. A valid library account is required in order to use this add-on.
extension.disclaimer: This add-on is a fork of the not actively maintained "plugin.video.filmfriend" by sarbes.
